title: This is just Normals, Therefore i have the license to feed
body:
How is this not a punishable offense?How is trolling not punished instantly?
i literally send them chat logs and screenshots people literally saying they are trolling and feeding intentionally but wont go 
punished.Tired of this.Yes, this is a game and there is winning or losing and losing because someone is purposely trying to lose the game is just OUT raging because there are players like me who play to enjoy a good game 
I just got an intentional feeder in my team saying how riot will punish me because i raged at him but he wont be punished because hes feeding and the bot lane trolling.
RIOT stop encouraging trolls and players who say "its just normals therefore implying they can troll or feed for no reason"4 players trying to win game but this 1 retard gives riots excuse of a normal game and just ruins it for everyone"

replies.body: Bans only come from ranked games. However, since it's normals, it's not ranked play in any way, so they will get warnings (like the AFK ones) implying something like, "You have recently been reported for summoner harassment and bullying/intentional feeding. We know everyone has their bad days, but remember to...". What I don't understand though, is that if you go AFK or abandon a game in normals (even in bots!), you'll get your ~~fair~~ unfair punishment for it. Trolling and feeding is just as bad. I don't think they deserve two-week bans, let alone permabans, but chat restriction for the next five normals should teach them a lesson. Just like the AFK penalty.

>Bans only come from ranked games

You sir don't understand the banning system.
Better off posting this on NA not on OCE.

RIOT is noob and its confirm don't rage here no point, in few years this company will shut down bcoz this game is so boring now. anyways not RIOT take sides of troll+feeders even in diamond that's y I don't like to play anymore
